message: ONE PERSON! A whole classroom of people and only ONE tried to stop him! The people in this country need to stop being victims. Actually it is an excellent choice because he knows what he is talking about and has more specific experience than many who might be appointed to that particular job This same magazine last weeknown for example suggested that it was paranoid of Europeans to worry about Salafis being.in Europe Which indicates you know virtually nothing about Salafis, or that your agenda is very dubious Those are the only two viable options While Gen Flynn knows a lot He was also author of the US Defence Intelligence Report 2012, made public last year 'There is a possibility of establishing a declared or undeclared Salafist principality in eastern Syria, and that is exactly what supporters to the opposition in Syria want to isolate the Syrian regime.' Gen Flynn stated last year that the US Government made a 'wilful decision' to allow ISIS to develop. He also confirmed that the paragraph relating to the Salafist principality that the US wanted in Syria (criminally, obviously, but breaching law and countries' sovereignty is something the US does so often, Washington has forgotten it isn't normal), anyway the paragraph in the Report referring to the Salafist principality the US wanted in Syria, meant ISIS. The truth about the incredibly barbaric terror group ISIS was known in the summer of 2014, and I have often written to the Foreign Office about it. Gen Flynn is a brilliant choice for National Security.

actually you were hateful when you called people lazy and self-important for using the service if not disabled. I would gladly pay the tiny fee to have people shop for me because I have 3 kids and dont have time for bs when Im trying to squeeze in a grocery trip before work. And good for you, taking your kids with you, but guess what? This is a different day and age and I can keep everyone happy and in the car while grabbing groceries. It sounds like maybe you need to find a new job if pushing a cart around upsets you.
